name: Keychron M6 Wireless Mouse
image_prompt: Keychron M6 wireless gaming mouse, white, lightweight honeycomb shell, RGB underglow, ergonomic shape
description: Ultra-lightweight wireless gaming mouse at 78g with PixArt 3395 sensor. Features 26K DPI, 1000Hz polling rate, 80-hour battery life, and hot-swappable switches.

reviews.review_text: Insane value for a wireless mouse with this sensor.
Hot-swappable switches let me customize the click feel.
Great mouse but software is basic compared to competitors.
